text: |} Kieren John Perkins OAM (born 14 August 1973), is an Australian professional sportsman. He is best known as a swimmer.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), Kieren Perkins ; retrieved 2012-8-21. Perkins won two Olympic gold medals in 1992 and 1996 in the 1500-metre freestyle, and a silver medal in 2000. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Olympic silver medalists for Australia Category:Commonwealth Games medallists Category:Australian swimmers
title: Kieren Perkins
